1-2 drops of alcohol the reason that we
do this is because black food coloring
or any food coloring by itself will take
a long time to set especially on
chocolate but if you mix it with some
alcohol the alcohol will evaporate and
it will actually cause it to set a lot
faster so if you just use black food
coloring you're looking at about a 48
hour setting time but if you use it with
alcohol it should be set and dry in
about an hour
